d_notes.title: Personal Portfolio
d_notes.description: This is my personal portfolio website, built from scratch using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The site showcases my completed projects, including photography and web development work, in a clear and interactive format. The design focuses on simplicity, readability, and user experience, allowing visitors to easily navigate between projects and learn about my skills. Each project dynamically loads its details from a JSON file, demonstrating both my front-end development skills and ability to structure content efficiently. This portfolio serves as a professional presentation of my work and a practical exercise in coding a fully functional, self-managed website.
d_notes.diag_descrip: The diagram represents the workflow from the initial concept in Figma to the final deployment. Each block symbolizes a key step in the process. The larger Figma block highlights the importance of planning and visual design—while it may not take the most time, it is essential to solidify the idea before building. Subsequent steps progressively transform the concept into a structured, styled, interactive, and finally live website.

projects.title: J&G Photography
projects.subtitle: Development of a website for J&G Photography LLC, a studio specializing in product photography, fine art portraits, and children's portraits.
projects.description: Modern, interactive, and customizable website built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Features include a dynamic navigation menu with scroll-based background color, a glass-effect hamburger menu without affecting carousel images, a custom service package builder using JSON and dropdowns, lightweight FormSubmit integration for messaging, and Google Maps iframe for location. Hosted on Vercel for free deployment, shortened URL, and basic analytics.
captions: Homepage hero with dynamic top menu
Hamburger menu with glass blur effect
Generated message ready to send via FormSubmit
Embedded Google Maps for studio location

projects.title: HandymanDMD
projects.description: Development of a simple and user-friendly website for HandymanDMD...

projects.title: Aurora Wellness Center
projects.description: Aurora Wellness Center is a personal project built on the free version of WordPress. Due to the limitations of the free plan, no custom CSS or HTML could be used, so the site was structured entirely using covers, columns, rows, and careful margin adjustments. The page is designed as a single-page layout with anchor links to different sections, providing a training exercise in organizing content and design with minimal tools. This project focuses on a calm and professional aesthetic, with warm, editorial-style photography, soft colors (greens, beige, cream, golden accents), and clear visual hierarchy. The site is still in development, serving as a practical exercise in layout, structure, and usability within WordPress constraints.

projects.title: jlprezc portfolio website
projects.description: This is a personal portfolio website, built from scratch using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The site showcases the photography of Jose Luis Perez Cespedes, featuring pixelated effects in the initial animations to reflect the digital pixels that are part of modern photography.
